    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

            <entry>15260</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="it">La Bulgaria in un click.</string>
            <string language="en">Bulgaria in a click</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bulgarien in einem Klicken</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Bulgarie dans un clic</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Bulgária em um clique</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Βουλγαρία σε ένα στιγμιαίο πάτημα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Bulgaria en un tecleo</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="it">Per tutti i ragazzi e le ragazze interessate ad imparare alcuni fatti sorprendenti sulla Bulgaria.</string>
            <string language="en">For all boys ang girls that are interested in learning some surprising key facts about Bulgaria</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="it">Bulgaro</string>
            <string language="en">Bulgarian</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="it">di origini bulgare</string>
            <string language="en">of Bulgarian origin</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="it">rituale tradizionale</string>
            <string language="en">traditional ritual</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="it">prodotto nazionale.</string>
            <string language="en">national product</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Für alle Jungen ang Mädchen, die interessiert 
sind, an, einige überraschende Schlüsseltatsachen über Bulgarien zu
erlernen</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Pour toutes les filles d'ang de garçons qui sont 
intéressées à apprendre quelques faits principaux étonnants sur la
Bulgarie</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Para todas as meninas do ang dos meninos que 
estão interessadas em aprender alguns fatos chaves surpreendendo 
sobre Bulgária</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Για όλα τα κορίτσια ANG αγοριών που ενδιαφέρονται 
για την εκμάθηση μερικών εκπληκτικών βασικών γεγονότων για τη 
Βουλγαρία</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Para todas las muchachas del ang de los muchachos
que están interesadas en aprender algunos hechos dominantes que 
sorprenden sobre Bulgaria</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bulgarisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">vom bulgarischen Ursprung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">traditionelles Ritual</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">nationales Produkt</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <description>
            <string language="it">Gli studenti possono usare il link con il sito Internet in modo da leggere più informazioni su alcuni fatti chiave sulla Bulgaria. Dopo avere ottenuto la conoscenza necessaria, devono abbinare le voci sulla destra con quelle sulla sinistra. Ciò può essere fatto trascinando e lasciando le voci adatte a destra sullo spazio appropriato a sinistra. Dopo aver finito il compito, i partecipanti possono controllare i loro risultati. Se alcune delle voci non si abbinano, gli studenti possono riprovare dopo aver rimosso gli abbinamenti sbagliati.</string>
            <string language="en">Students may use the link to the internet site so that they read more information about some key Bulgaria’s facts. After they have gained the necessary knowledge, they have to match the given items on the right to the ones on the left. This can be done by dragging and dropping the suitable item on the right to its appropriate place on the left.After finishing the task, the participants can check their results. If some of the items don’t match students can try again with the incorrect matches being removed.</string>
          </description>
        </educational>
